job.title: Software engineer - Perception
job.description: <br><strong>Summary<br></strong> <br>Apple is looking for software engineers to develop and deploy Perception technologies for autonomous systems. You will work on a hardware/software product enabled by the systems you build.<br><br> <br><strong>Key Qualifications<br></strong> <br>C++. You write clean, well-tested code. You’re passionate about code efficiency and correctness.<br><br>Experience working with production software. <br><br>You are able to understand and contribute to high-quality software for a complex system.<br><br>Experience implementing numerical algorithms (preferably in HPC environment).<br><br>Proficient understanding of algorithms and data structures.<br><br>Excellent communication skills. You collaborate optimally with other teams and communicate clearly about your work.<br><br> <br><strong>Description<br></strong> <br>WHAT YOU’LL DO<br><br>- Take groundbreaking perception models from the lab to a critical system.<br><br>- Work with machine learning teams to harden models for deployment.<br><br>- Implement optimized algorithms that perform within platform constraints.<br><br>- Develop and support tools that accelerate development and deployment.<br><br>- Ownership for design, development, deployment and test.<br><br>WORKING WITH THE TEAM <br><br>- You’ll join a fantastic team of hardworking engineers and researchers with deep experience in robotics, machine learning, and software engineering. We hope you are passionate about the values that drive us:<br><br>- Passion for the mission: We’re here to make something great. We seek whatever work is right for the product and strive for the best possible results.<br><br>- Modesty: The right answer is more meaningful than being right. We search for solutions as a team and value clear-eyed feedback.<br><br>- Lean habits: You can’t grow without limits. Time constraints and big goals inspire us to sharpen our focus and learn to make phenomenal decisions.<br><br><br><br>OTHER SKILLS WE LIKE TO SEE<br><br>- Experience with Python programming.<br><br>- Experience with Parallel (tbb / OpenMP) and/or GPGPU programming.<br><br>- Strong 3D math and linear algebra skills.<br><br>- Familiarity with cloud development (e.g., AWS, Spark, SQL and databases).<br><br>- Familiarity with optimization of neural networks for deployment.<br><br> <br><strong>Education &amp; Experience<br></strong> <br>Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or equivalent professional experience.<br><br> <br>Role Number: 200169360<br><br>
